trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered pair of floating-point x- and y-coordinates that defines a point in a two-dimensional plane.
trans-unit.target: Representa um par ordenado de coordenadas x e y de ponto flutuante inteiros que define um ponto em um plano bidimensional.

trans-unit.source: To convert a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Point>, use <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Round%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Truncate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para converter um <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> para um <xref:System.Drawing.Point>, use <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Round%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Truncate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal position of the point.
trans-unit.target: A posição horizontal do ponto.

trans-unit.source: The vertical position of the point.
trans-unit.target: A posição vertical do ponto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> class with the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> com as coordenadas especificadas.

trans-unit.source: Translates a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the specified size.
trans-unit.target: Converte um determinado <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> pelo tamanho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que especifica os números a serem adicionados às coordenadas de <c>pt</c>.

trans-unit.source: Translates a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Move um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> especificado pelo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> movido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> method adds the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> método adiciona o <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> do tamanho especificado para a coordenada x do <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> para a coordenada y do <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> that specifies the numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> que especifica os números a serem adicionados às coordenadas de <c>pt</c>.

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> movido.

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> método adiciona o <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> do tamanho especificado para a coordenada x do <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> e <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> para a coordenada y do <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.

trans-unit.source: Represents a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> class with member data left uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> que tem dados de membro deixados não inicializados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> contains the same coordinates as the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> contém as mesmas coordenadas que o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> and has the same coordinates as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método retornará <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> for um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> e tiver as mesmas coordenadas que este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que especifica um valor de hash para esta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> está vazio.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> are 0; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se tanto <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> quanto <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> forem 0; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Translates the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by a specified size.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> determinado por um tamanho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the pair of numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que especifica o par de números a adicionar às coordenadas do <c>pt</c>.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Move um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> por um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> determinado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> convertido.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir adiciona uma sombra em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> usando o <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operador.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole este código em um formulário e a chamada a `AddShadow` método ao lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
trans-unit.target: Verifique se o formulário contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> chamado `listBox1`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> a ser movido.

trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> que especifica os números a adicionar às coordenadas x e y do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.

trans-unit.source: Translates the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operator adds the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operador adiciona o <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> do tamanho especificado para a coordenada x do <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> e <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> para a coordenada y do <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.

trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%28System.Drawing.PointF%2CSystem.Drawing.SizeF%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Compara duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.

trans-unit.source: The result specifies whether the values of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> properties of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: O resultado especifica se os valores das propriedades <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> das duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> values of the left and right <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os valores de <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> das estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> esquerda e direita forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
